vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
ἀχειρο-ποίητος, ον,
not made by hands, of buildings and statues, [NT]; ἀ. περιτομή, i.e. spiritual, [NT]
vocabInfos.shortDef: not made by human hands, implying not of human origin
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
not made by human hands, implying not of human origin
not made with hands, not of human origin Mk. 14:58; 2Cor. 5:1; Col. 2:11*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: que no ha sido hecho por manos humanas ; no en un sentido físico (COL.2:11) ;
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition: 非手工作的, 不是人手可以做得出來的 (可 14:58; 林後 5:1; 西 2:11)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition: 非手工作的, 不是人手可以做得出来的 (可 14:58; 林后 5:1; 西 2:11)
